about_the_game:
In "Star Conqueror," you take on the role of a space commander, forging alliances with 10+ factions to build and lead your interstellar fleet against the Andromeda invasion. Customize your starships, engage in real-time battles, and partake in governance decisions and trade. Collaborate or compete with other players to script your own interstellar legend.

Build The Interstellar Fleet Of Your Dreams


■ 10+ unique factions, each with charismatic leaders and distinctive traits.
■ Over 100 base components and faction-specific modules for you to freely mix and match.
■ Long-term balance support ensures that customizing your starships is filled with strategy and enjoyment.

Conquer In grand and Epic Space Battles


■ Vast battlefield accommodating the clash of 200+ warships.
■ Utilize over 20 decisive weapons to turn the table or set the victory.

Real-time Tactical PvP & Multiplayer


■ Establish or join interstellar guilds, conquer space together with friends.
■ 4 types of battle modes and 1 interstellar battlefield, win honor and resources for your fleet.
■ Of course, there's also plenty of intense PVE combat.

Script Your Legend Within The Theatrical Narrative


■ With nearly a million words of storytelling, experience a vast and tumultuous galaxy
■ Governance decision-making, trade building... Bringing you the commander experience beyond battles.
■ eXplore, eXpand, eXploit and eXterminate, triggering more interconnected stories, delving into mysterious depths, and crafting your own legend.


The following languages have been translated and proofread.
English 简体中文
The following languages are still in the testing phase.
Français Español - España Português - Brasil Deutsch Русский язык 日本語 繁體中文 한국어 Italiano Português - Portugal Polski Čeština Español - América Latina Türkçe ภาษาไทย
detailed_description:
In "Star Conqueror," you take on the role of a space commander, forging alliances with 10+ factions to build and lead your interstellar fleet against the Andromeda invasion. Customize your starships, engage in real-time battles, and partake in governance decisions and trade. Collaborate or compete with other players to script your own interstellar legend.

Build The Interstellar Fleet Of Your Dreams


■ 10+ unique factions, each with charismatic leaders and distinctive traits.
■ Over 100 base components and faction-specific modules for you to freely mix and match.
■ Long-term balance support ensures that customizing your starships is filled with strategy and enjoyment.

Conquer In grand and Epic Space Battles


■ Vast battlefield accommodating the clash of 200+ warships.
■ Utilize over 20 decisive weapons to turn the table or set the victory.

Real-time Tactical PvP & Multiplayer


■ Establish or join interstellar guilds, conquer space together with friends.
■ 4 types of battle modes and 1 interstellar battlefield, win honor and resources for your fleet.
■ Of course, there's also plenty of intense PVE combat.

Script Your Legend Within The Theatrical Narrative


■ With nearly a million words of storytelling, experience a vast and tumultuous galaxy
■ Governance decision-making, trade building... Bringing you the commander experience beyond battles.
■ eXplore, eXpand, eXploit and eXterminate, triggering more interconnected stories, delving into mysterious depths, and crafting your own legend.

name: Star Conqueror 舰队指挥官

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Star Conqueror 舰队指挥官

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: i3-6300 or Ryzen1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX960 or RX6400
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: i7-6700K or Ryzen5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660 or RX 6500XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Engage in real-time battles with customizable space warships. Explore the galaxy, forge alliances, develop powerful ships, and defeat alien invaders.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
